[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”PROFESSIONAL PSYCHIATRIST” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:14|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Hello! I am Dr. Sandra Miller” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36|text_align:center|color:%2342474c|line_height:1.5″ google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”][gt3_spacing height=”17px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”75px” accent_color=”#d9e0e4″][gt3_spacing height=”30px”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#727e85″ font_size=”18″ line_height=”160″ use_theme_fonts=”” google_fonts_text=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal”]

Today you are one step closer to a new you where you feel empowered and on a positive path to growth and well-being. As a cognitive-behavioral, solution-focused therapist, my goal is to help you uncover your true potential and lead a life that is worth celebrating. While we can’t change difficult situations of the past, we can work together to better understand and resolve challenges in your life.

[/gt3_custom_text][gt3_spacing height=”30px”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#42474c” font_size=”18″ use_theme_fonts=”” google_fonts_text=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]

Just Call Me Now and Make an Appoinment

[/gt3_custom_text][gt3_spacing height=”30px”][gt3_custom_text text_color=”#727e85″ font_size=”30″ use_theme_fonts=”” google_fonts_text=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” responsive_font=”true” font_size_mobile=”18″]

I offer a friendly and down-to-earth approach to therapy, providing a safe, confidential and non-judgemental

space to talk. With training and experience in the main evidence-based psychotherapies

We think it’s really important that clinicians have a mixture of clinical skill and human qualities that mean you can place your trust in them. We interview every potential partner in person before we agree to work with them, as well as carrying out rigorous background checks.

[/gt3_custom_text][vc_empty_space height=”6vh”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][gt3_spacing height=”39px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][gt3_price_block title=”Session pay” header_img=”908″ price=”100″ css=”.vc_custom_1519119196539{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” price_suffix=”$” button_link=”url:%23|title:select%20plan%20||”]
